entries.hit_target_14: Ya better run away while ya can!
entries.ally_16: Lemme even up the odds summat.
entries.ally_15: Are y'okay, buddy? Lemme take care o' this.
entries.ally_13: I don' care who y'are, ya don't touch my friends.
entries.ally_12: Hey now! You should be leavin' my friend alone!
entries.ally_10: Welp, guess I should be steppin' in here.
entries.ally_9: Yer lookin' like you could use some help.
entries.ally_7: Pick on a droid yer own size!
entries.ally_6: Coward, why dontcha pick on me instead?
entries.ally_5: Just a sec there! What're ya doin'?
entries.ally_2: Ya don' lay a finger on my friends!
entries.ally_1: Get away from my friend there!
entries.help_16: I could be usin' help here!
entries.help_7: I can't handle it all by my lonesome...!
entries.help_6: I could be usin' some help here...!
entries.help_5: Don' mean to bother ya, but... HELP!
entries.help_2: I'm needin' some help, anytime now...
entries.attacked_16: Here's hopin' yer will is ready.
entries.attacked_14: Aww, don' make me kill ya!
entries.attacked_13: Pickin' on little ol' me, huh?
entries.attacked_12: If'n ya start runnin' now, ya might get away...
entries.attacked_8: Ya better run. Killin' don't take me long.
entries.attacked_7: They got a table ready for ya in the afterlife, I hear.
entries.attacked_6: Can't wait ta loot yer corpse!
entries.attacked_5: I allus thought I might get dismantled someday.
entries.attacked_4: Ya realize you'll miss out on old age, right?
entries.attacked_3: Another fight? Yeesh, next time I'm invited ta one, I'm skippin'.
entries.attacked_2: Yer not the toughest to try to take me down, ya know.
entries.hit_12: Hey, is there a mechanic in the house?
entries.hit_11: Hurm, this could be gettin' bad by and by.
entries.hit_9: Go on then, try an' do that again!
entries.hit_8: That the best ya can do?
entries.hit_7: Nice try, buddy, but I'm still here!
entries.hit_6: Gee, now yer makin' me mad.
entries.hit_3: You'll need more'n that ta take me down!
entries.gloat_11: I hate havin' ta kill folks...
entries.gloat_7: Someone better mop this mess up.
entries.gloat_6: Heh, yer thinkin' ya can take ME on?
entries.gloat_5: Now, ya were a worthy opponent and all...
entries.gloat_1: Well, that was easy, I'm thinkin'.
entries.death_14: Yer gonna live ta regret this...
entries.death_13: I always thought I'd have more time in this world...
entries.death_9: Yer never goin' ta be rid o' me...
entries.death_8: I swear I'll haunt ya to yer grave...
entries.death_6: FATAL:: central core overheated. Memory core crashing.
entries.death_5: I's too newly manufactured ta die.
entries.death_2: My sensors are fadin'... I'm seein' a white tunnel...
entries.death_1: Welp, THAT hurt. Fatal, possibly. Yep.
entries.threat_16: Goody, someone ta practice targets on.
entries.threat_15: Yer better back off, I'm the fastest droid in the system.
entries.threat_14: Yer guts are gonna get spilled on the ground here...
entries.threat_13: Gimme an excuse ta kill ya...
entries.threat_12: Come closer, ya can have a droid beatcha up!
entries.threat_10: I'm thinkin' you'd make a nice stuffed trophy.
entries.threat_9: I'm drawin' a line in the sand here, and I'm on this side, see, and yer on the other side, and... oh, never mind.
entries.threat_7: C'mon then. Bring it on, buddy!
entries.threat_6: Back off, buddy, or I'll do somethin' yer gonna hate...
entries.threat_5: If ya know what's good for ya, you'll scram on outta here.
entries.threat_4: This is a dangerous place for the likes o' you.
entries.threat_3: Ya better clear on outta here.
entries.bye_mean_16: Glad to have wasted th' time o'day on ya.
entries.bye_mean_14: Next time ya come, bring friends. Love to beat ya ALL up.
entries.bye_mean_13: Here's hopin' ya don't come back!
entries.bye_mean_11: Better not let me catch ya in a dark alley.
entries.bye_mean_10: Aww, leavin' before a fight huh?
entries.bye_mean_9: No need to run, we can play some, if ya want, heh heh.
entries.bye_mean_7: Ya ain't welcome, so get outta here.
entries.bye_mean_6: Better leave, afore I delete ya..
entries.bye_mean_4: Thass right, take a hike into a Sarlaac, scumbag.
entries.bye_mid_16: In a rush, huh? Bye then.
entries.bye_mid_15: Someone waitin' on ya? See ya 'round then.
entries.bye_mid_14: Got a date? See ya later.
entries.bye_nice_15: Really great to see ya, y'know.
entries.bye_nice_14: Wuz an honor ter see ya. Honest.
entries.bye_nice_13: Sure hope to see ya again.
entries.bye_nice_12: Will I ever see ya again?
entries.bye_nice_9: Well, I hate ter see ya go...
entries.bye_nice_7: Hey now, I'll see ya later!
entries.bye_nice_1: Nice ta see ya! Bye now!
entries.hi_mean_16: You like yer bones intact, ya better leave.
entries.hi_mean_15: Well, now, I been itchin' for a fight lately...
entries.hi_mean_13: Looky here, a maggot come to say hullo.
entries.hi_mean_12: Get yer face outta my sight.
entries.hi_mean_10: Clear out. You don' wanna see me really angry.
entries.hi_mean_8: Looky who it is. Lemme plug my ears.
entries.hi_mean_4: Be a waste o' breath to say hullo to the likes of YOU.
entries.hi_mean_3: You smell bantha poodoo? Oh, must be my
entries.hi_mid_15: Oh yeah. Can I help ya?
entries.hi_nice_11: Hullo! Right nice to see ya!
entries.hi_nice_8: Well, yer a sight for my sore eyes!
entries.hi_nice_1: 'S great to see ya again, buddy!
entries.flee_16: Why'm I always in the soup?
entries.alert_8: Hang on a bit... what wuzzat?
entries.alert_7: I gots a bad feelin' about this...
entries.alert_6: I'm gettin' a bad feelin' about now...
entries.calm_5: Time ter go to my happy place.
entries.calm_4: Time ter settle down a bit. Whew,
